entry.string: Grant Rights for an unregistered user
entry.translation: Grunt Reeghts fur un unregeestered user

entry.string: Send error reports to Site Admin?
entry.translation: Send irrur repurts tu Seete-a Edmeen?

entry.string: Send error reports to AddressBook Quality Control?
entry.translation: Send irrur repurts tu EddressBuuk Qooeleety Cuntrul?

entry.string: Quality Control Reports are sent whenever AddressBook catches an error that halts user processing. These are typically errors in the module software which should be corrected by the development team.
entry.translation: Qooeleety Cuntrul Repurts ere-a sent vhenefer EddressBuuk cetches un irrur thet helts user prucesseeng. Zeese-a ere-a typeecelly irrurs in zee mudoole-a sufftvere-a vheech shuoold be-a currected by zee defelupment teem.
